title: Week 7 TNF Recap: Andy Dalton throws three picks, Kyler Yells at Kliff, Who should start at QB for the Saints (Football 10/21)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, and John Breech give their thoughts on the TNF matchup between the Saints and the Cardinals.
